about_the_game:
Prepare for an interstellar journey like no other as Cosmotrons takes you to the cosmos with the ultimate online multiplayer experience! Strap into your spacecraft, assemble your crew, and get ready for an out-of-this-world adventure.

Key Features
  • Online Multiplayer - Challenge friends and players worldwide in exhilarating online battles.
  • Cosmic Variety - Pilot a wide array of spacecraft, each with unique abilities and playstyles.
  • Strategic Depth - Craft your tactics, choose your powerups, and adapt to ever-changing battle conditions.
  • Stunning Retro Visuals - Immerse yourself in the breathtaking beauty of the cosmos like it's 1984.

Online Multiplayer Action
Gather your friends from across the galaxy and take on players worldwide in thrilling online multiplayer matches. Team up against a player controlled boss, go head-to-head in capture the flag, or engage in free-for-all chaos as you battle for supremacy among the stars. Cosmotrons brings the excitement of the arcade straight to your screen!

  • SINGLE PLAYER MODE
    Fly through hoops and shoot the targets as fast as you can.

  • VS MODE
    Compete in a 4 player free-for-all and conquer territories by any means necessary.

  • TEAM MODE
    Destroy the other team or capture two flags before the other team.

  • BE THE BOSS
    Destroy the other players as the Boss or work together with your team to destroy the Boss.












    Destroy your enemies as you fly through a variety of different maps with your choice of a number of ships specifically suited to your play style. From fuel preserving and defensive to an all-out gas guzzling, machine-gun blasting Beast; there's a ship for everyone. Each ship has its own special abilities and a choice of special charge shot. Choose your setup wisely!

    Master the Art of Space Combat
    Cosmotrons is not just a game; it's a cosmic battleground where skill and strategy collide. Engage in epic dogfights, navigate treacherous environments and outmaneuver your opponents in intense, fast-paced multiplayer battles. Are you ready to become a true space ace?

    Join the Cosmotrons Community
    Stay connected with fellow space adventurers in the Cosmotrons universe. Share your triumphs, discuss strategies, and join events that will take you to the farthest reaches of space exploration. Keep an eye on Cosmotrons social media pages and watch out for real-world tournaments at arcades near you!

    Get ready to go cosmic - add Cosmotrons to your Steam library today!

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Quad core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1080p 60fps - Integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Quad core @ 3GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4k 60fps - Discrete graphics card w/ 4GB VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
